item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 6, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Finland ends homelessness and provides shelter for all in need (145 points | 48 comments)
2. Automatically tagging politician when they use their phone on the livestreams (149 points | 74 comments)
3. Show HN: LLMs Playing Mafia games – See them lie, deceive, and reason (14 points | 1 comment)
4. Age and cognitive skills: Use it or lose it (129 points | 51 comments)
5. A shirt whose price increases by 1 euro with every purchase (37 points | 16 comments)
6. Revolt: Open-Source Alternative to Discord (271 points | 220 comments)
7. Let's Talk About the American Dream (26 points | 3 comments)
8. Simple Explanation of LLMs (59 points | 15 comments)
9. AMD Announces "Instella" Open-Source 3B Language Models (111 points | 25 comments)
10. Empirical Health is hiring design engineers to build primary care of the future ( | hide)
11. Fix the light guide in a laser meter (8 points | discuss)
12. DeepSeek-R1-671B-Q4_K_M with 1 or 2 Arc A770 on Xeon (280 points | 94 comments)
13. Tailscale is pretty useful (736 points | 354 comments)
14. Demos of Stream Processing Solving Real-World Problems (37 points | 1 comment)
15. Apple M3 Ultra (978 points | 910 comments)

21. MacBook Air M4 (647 points | 801 comments)
22. Forget Twitter Threads; Write a Blog Post Instead (2021) (124 points | 73 comments)
23. On the criteria to be used in decomposing systems into modules (1972) (11 points | discuss)
24. Windows Is Free for Business (2008) (16 points | 13 comments)
25. Apache iceberg the Hadoop of the modern-data-stack? (40 points | 16 comments)
26. Now there are two Chinese automakers on the top list (36 points | 28 comments)
27. Zentool – AMD Zen Microcode Manipulation Utility (181 points | 40 comments)
28. I Used to Teach Students. Now I Catch ChatGPT Cheats (7 points | 1 comment)
29. Exploring the Paramilitary Leaks (170 points | 84 comments)
30. The US stops sharing air quality data from embassies worldwide (571 points | 337 comments)
